detail.name: Faux-Fur-Trim Hooded Anorak, Created for Macy's
detail.description: DKNY's utility-inspired anorak features faux-fur trim at the hood for a contemporary touch to a classic pick.
detail.seoKeywords: DKNY, DKNY Faux-Fur-Trim Hooded Anorak, Created for Macy's
bulletText: Approx. model height is 5'9" and she is wearing a size Small
Approx. 32-1/2" long from center back to hem
Removable hood with faux-fur trim; front zipper closure with button overlay
Snap and zipper pockets at front
Shell: polyester/polyamide; lining, fill: polyester; faux fur: acrylic
detail.completeName: DKNY Faux-Fur-Trim Hooded Anorak, Created for Macy's

notes: Returns are accepted at any Macy's store within 90 days from purchase date. Last Act clearance items must be returned within 30 days from purchase date.
freeShippingMessages: This item qualifies for Free Shipping with minimum purchase!

19899849.checkoutDescription: Enjoy free shipping when you spend $25 or more! See exclusions for details.
19899849.description: Enjoy Free Shipping at $25! See exclusions.
19899849.legalDisclaimer: TO GET FREE SHIPPING WITH $25 PURCHASE: Place $25 of qualifying items in shopping bag. No promo code needed. Ends February 2, 2020. The minimum purchase amount for Free Shipping does not include gift wrap charges, purchases of Gift Cards or tax. Offer applies to Standard Shipping to one location and may be applied to Premium or Overnight Shipping for an upgrade fee. Free Shipping does not apply to furniture, mattresses, oversized rugs, purchases in Macy's stores, prior purchases or international orders. A $10 shipping surcharge on domestic orders applies to customers living outside the contiguous United States: Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico, Guam, American Samoa, Micronesia, Marshall Islands, North Mariana Islands, Palau and U.S. Virgin Islands. Due to size and/or weight, certain items bear a shipping surcharge, which will still apply. When shipping to multiple addresses, only shipping to the first address will qualify for Free Shipping; Standard Shipping will apply to all other addresses. Free Shipping cannot be applied to purchases being shipped to U.S. territories or APO/FPO addresses. Restricted items include aerosols, pressurized spray cans and alcohol-based products (hairspray, nail polish, nail polish remover, shaving cream, etc.). Due to air transport restrictions and regulations, these items are required by the U.S. Department of Transportation to be shipped by Standard Ground Shipping only. These restricted items are not eligible for Premium or Overnight Shipping. TO GET FREE RETURNS: You can return merchandise by mail or in store for a full refund, which will be credited on your original tender. Free Returns exclude gift cards, food, gourmet gifts, lamps, wall art, mirrors, furniture, mattresses & area rugs. Does not apply to international orders. Gift returns or orders with different shipping & billing information or purchased with a Gift Card are refunded on an Easy Exchange Card, which you can use for future online or in-store purchases.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable, soft coat.. looks nice.. not as warm as I thought it was going to be so that was slightly disappointing.. bought to wear when it gets really cold but will have to get a different one for those days. Wish the fill was better quality/more if it..  would make it warmer. I would recommend but not for the warmth

reviews.title: My favorite coat ever
reviews.reviewText: I fell in love with this coat over a month before and keep passing it by in the store. When the black friday sale came up I was there.....

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful jacket fits perfectly and I have received a lot of compliments on it

reviews.title: Great coat!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this coat.  For me, it's a perfect design.  Zip & snap, pockets, good fit hood, ribbed stretchy wrists and and a waist! All the things I want in a casual puffer.  The only thing that would have made it even better was a higher quality fill.  But for the price, it's fantastic.

reviews.title: Great addition to my closet
reviews.reviewText: I bought it in Olive color, I'm very glad that it's exactly like in the picture. Really loved it and I'll use it for many winters. Beautiful color and have many pockets, including inside (so you can put documents and cellphone). I bought it on sale what made it worth even more.

reviews.title: Love my jacket
reviews.reviewText:
First the weight is very light. The material is soft and the look is great. I actually went back and bought the green because of how nice it feels and the fit is just right 
I would definitely recommend it and trust me you will not regret buying it 
Love my jacket and overall the price

reviews.title: Satisfied!
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat. The fit is flattering. I'm 5ft 135 pounds. The length is great. A petite size would have been to short. I'm a little curvy. The sleeves are a tad long but not too bad. The sinched look is trendy. The sizing runs a little big. I'm normally a small and had to buy and XS. I debated the small for layering but not a sweater person. My cardigans fit perfect underneath. If you thick layer, Stay with your true size. I just hope it dsnt shrink. Fingers crossed

reviews.title: Warm and cozy
reviews.reviewText:
This coat is beautiful, warm and well made.
Absolutely love this coat!! I'm so glad I purchased it to keep me warm this winter.

reviews.title: Warm cute and reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: I just got this coat and couldn’t be happier. It’s soft and cozy and very warm. Walked my dog in 22 degree weather steps from Lake Michigan tonight, So it’s COLD !!! It kept me warm. I wear medium shirts and sweaters but ordered a large And glad I did. Fits great and can accommodate a sweater and is super cute.

reviews.title: Beautiful coat
reviews.reviewText: Love the olive color, the snuggly collar, the soft material, and the length. Also like that it snaps over the zipper to keep the cold out. Side pockets are a little low for my hands, but they can go in the top of the snap pockets. The sleeves are a little long on me, but when you layer, it takes some of the length up. I got the XL because I'm apple shaped. I'm a 14-16, L-XL. It is also rated for 0 degrees.

reviews.title: Perfectly plush
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 20 year old daughter and now I want one of my own! Its soft and warm❤

reviews.title: Review
reviews.reviewText: So warm and comfy. Feels like getting a hug. Love wearing it. Keeps me warm in the cold weather. A little big so I can layer up.

reviews.title: soft and warm
reviews.reviewText: very nice coat. the fabric is super soft and warm. the fur lining on the hood is extremely soft, I wish it was throughout the lining of the coat. Runs a little large which is perfect for winter layering. the length is perfect for me (i'm 5'9") but maybe a little long for someone who's shorter. washed up nicely in the washer and dryed fine in the dryer

reviews.title: Great warm coat
reviews.reviewText: This is a great coat. So many pockets, I love the high warm collar. The hood is a bit big, but its super warm. I like how I can choose to use the zipper,snaps or both.

reviews.title: Adorable!
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is adorable! I'm partial to green too so when I saw that it came in green I was so happy. The hood I have detached after trying it on with the jacket because the faux fur sticks up and I'm trying to tame it down.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.reviewText: Lovely color, cozy collar, lots of pockets, and a super hood.

reviews.title: Get buy
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fit, the style and the color! It has all the pockets I could want and a zipped one to boot! The price wasn't bad either.

reviews.title: PERFECT WINTER COAT
reviews.reviewText: The style, comfort, ample pocket, warmth and hood.

reviews.title: Beautiful coat
reviews.reviewText: This coat is super soft and comfortable. I like the longer length. Come on winter ..I'm ready for now !!

reviews.title: Great Coat
reviews.reviewText: Warm and stylish. Purchased as a gift for my daughter and she loves it.

product_name: Faux-Fur-Trim Hooded Anorak, Created for Macy's
